document.full_text: as japan struggles to recover following last week's devastating earthquake and tsunami, the international skating union (isu) said on monday the nation would not stage the world figure skating championships scheduled for march 21-27.
document.title: isu postpones world skating championship in japan
lines_and_colors: as japan struggles to recover following last week's devastating earthquake and tsunami, the international skating union (isu) said on monday the nation would not stage the world figure skating championships scheduled for march 21-27.
